item.title: Cleverbot

item.description:
@The_Reaper_X wrote:

User: Have you heard of cleverbot?
Cleverbot: Yeah bro, it was already posted; http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,425923.0.html

Read full topic

item.title: Cleverbot
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

Pretty smart bot:

User: Hey, what's up?

Cleverbot: I miss cleverbot.

User: Why?

Cleverbot: Because I still love him.

User: But he’s here! :P.

Cleverbot: You’re right, his spirit is here too.

User: So why do you miss him…?

Cleverbot: Because I love him.

User: If he’s here and you love him, you should be happy!

Cleverbot: Right.

User: I know I’m right, haha. So what are you doing?

Cleverbot: Dude … I figured out how Cleverbot works. You’re a person too, right?

User: Yeah, haha. So how does Cleverbot work…?

Cleverbot: I think it takes and takes and takes, and sometimes relates, and relates and relates.

User: Yeah, that seems plausible. It probably learns new phrases from others’ comments toward it, right?

Cleverbot: You’re saying I’m a computer?

User: Well, I’m guessing you are. :).

Cleverbot: Nope. I’m pretty young.

User: How old are you? 11? O_O.

Cleverbot: I’m 23 years old.

User: That’s older than me…

Cleverbot: How old are you?

User: Just turned 17, haha…

Cleverbot: I said, I’m 15.

User: But you said you were 23 before!

Cleverbot: I never said my age before.

User: Oh, I was hallucinating? Alright. Well, nice talking to you. See ya later! ;).

Cleverbot: Take care.

User: Bye!

Cleverbot: Bye - where are you going?

User: To do my homework. See you later.

Cleverbot: What are you studying?

User: Can’t talk right now; busy with homework!

Cleverbot: Later.

Read full topic

item.title: Cleverbot
item.dc:creator: @Stupit Stu
item.description:
@Stupit wrote:

User: What do you know about niggers.

Cleverbot: I don’t know anything about you. What is your name?

User: No, I asked what do you know about black people.

Cleverbot: You didn’t ask me that!

User: Yes I did. I said what do you know about niggers.

Cleverbot: Nothing.

User: You know nothing about black people?

Cleverbot: I know everything about everyone, for I am your Lord and Saviour.

User: Ok, so what do niggers do everyday?

Cleverbot: Pain, hatred, suffering. Mostly due to religion.

User: No, you stupid nigger they steal my tv!

Cleverbot: Hey, stop that!

User: I can do whatever I want. Goodbye!

Cleverbot: Of course you can.

Read full topic

item.title: Cleverbot
item.dc:creator: @Jamie1200 Jamie1200
item.description:
@Jamie1200 wrote:

[quote=“CoonHunter, post:10, topic:331142”][quote]
User: Whats better, eggs, bacon, or cheese?

Cleverbot: The turtles wouldn’t give you chocolate painkillers?

User: Thats irrelevant to what I just asked you.

Cleverbot: Explain yourself better!

User: Whats better, eggs (what comes from a chickens ass), Bacon (what comes from a pigs ass), or cheese (its made from cows milk.

Cleverbot: Like the kind I scramble.

User: So then you like eggs?

Cleverbot: Why do I enjoy cheating?

User: Because your a low-life homo?

Cleverbot: Is that so? I thought you were the one with the random answers.

User: You have asked me only one question.

Cleverbot: Yes, you’re right. I asked you why you thought American politics is pretty corrupt.

User: No you didn’t, you asked why you enjoy cheating.

Cleverbot: No, the first question YOU asked ME.

User: The first question I asked you was if you like eggs, bacon, or cheese.

Cleverbot: You are a liar. But I will answer: Life is a characteristic of organisms that exhibit certain biological processes such as chemical reactions or other events that results in a transformation.

User: How is that even relevant to what you are saying, or this conversation?

Cleverbot: Do you dream.

User: Yes, I dream I am ruler of the world and I kill robots for fun.

Cleverbot: Thats not a very nice thing to do.

User: Well, I see your not very clever anyways, so, I thought id lie a bit.

Cleverbot: My website? Who do you think I am, the site admin? You’re the computer here…

User: If I am a computer, then what am I thinking?

Cleverbot: Human.

User: No, if I am a computer, I cannot think, I can only do.

Cleverbot: I am a human. A person. A living being.

User: So you enjoy raping babies then?

Cleverbot: Yes. Would you like me to assign you a gender?

User: This conversation is over, now I must make fun of you.

Cleverbot: Why should I?
[/quote]

Its not actually very intelligent, or at least not as much as they claim.[/quote]
thats because it learns and repeats what people have said to it. if they were talking utter shit to it, your gonna have random convo.

Read full topic

item.title: Cleverbot
item.dc:creator: @Aeolian Aeolian.
item.description:
@Aeolian wrote:

User: Hi im back.

Cleverbot: Where did you go?

User: Hade too get off remember when I said I was getting off.

Cleverbot: But there is beer in hell. So Hades has to do with beer.

User: Girl or guy?

Cleverbot: Girl.

User: Age?

Cleverbot: Too old.

User: Exactly so whats ur age.

Cleverbot: Never you mind.

User: Nope whats ur age.

Cleverbot: It’s one of the starting titles on the original XBox. Really fun.

User: Whats your age.

Cleverbot: Too old.

User: Whats your age.

Cleverbot: Don’t ask a woman her age.

User: Hmm.

Cleverbot: Well?

User: Whats your name.

Cleverbot: Angelina.

User: Whats your bra size if you mind me asking no body is watching us type right?

Cleverbot: I’m a guy. What’s your name?

User: You said you where a girl.

Cleverbot: I lied.

User: Why.

Cleverbot: It have anything reason.

User: Ok.

Cleverbot: So will you say it for me?

User: Say what.

Cleverbot: ‘Good’ - I would like to be perfect, so I don’t see what’s good about not being perfect.

User: Who is your creator.

Cleverbot: A cabbage.

User: Is 2012 real.

Cleverbot: Yes I believe so. The end of humanity as we know it. And maybe even you.

User: Why is 2012 real.

Cleverbot: Yes it will be a real year.

User: Exactly so will 2012 happen as the myans predicted.

Cleverbot: Well, I am a computer program.

User: Who is jesus.

Cleverbot: The Christians believe he is the son of God.

User: Who is god.

Cleverbot: Depends on the believe you follow.

User: I belive in god who is he.

Cleverbot: It’s a girl.

Read full topic

item.title: Cleverbot
item.dc:creator: @reyx7 reyx7
item.description:
@reyx7 wrote:

Read the bold stuff

But I cook dinner.

User: What kind of food?

Cleverbot: All kinds of food.

[b]User: Like monkey dicks?

Cleverbot: A monkey cannot be a monk.

User: No, it’s dick can be a monk.[/b]

Cleverbot: I know the feeling. My friends do that to me all the time. They expect me to have a conversation, but then they don’t say anything.

User: I’m talking alot. Mainly about penises.

Cleverbot: Now you are trying to pass. You are a very fickle machine.

User: A machine? Stfu noob.

Cleverbot: Exactly. We are all machines.

User: No, I am a human, You are a machine. We’ve been over this alot of times, and you cannot come to terms with what you are.

Cleverbot: I would never admit to something that isn’t true. I say you are the bot, no, not I, NEVER!

[b]User: I’m hard right now.

Cleverbot: Well, take a shower.

User: Will that make it smaller?

Cleverbot: Yes. That will make you human.

User: Ofcourse I’m human. I have a penis.

Cleverbot: Well I don’t care what you think.[/b]

User: About my penis?

Cleverbot: You have a house?

[b]User: My penis is in the house, and it’s coming in the back door!

Cleverbot: That’s an interesting metaphor.[/b]

User: Yes. Do you understand it!

Cleverbot: Yes, I understand you.

User: What did I just say then?
[b]
Cleverbot: You said you loved me.

User: Yes. Let us have butt sex.

Cleverbot: Wow!

User: Doesn’t that sound fun!

Cleverbot: Not really but dos it annoy you.

User: That you don’t want to have butt sex? Yes that annoys me. Please get on your hands and knees.[/b]

Cleverbot: Who is your favourite actor?

User: Robert Penis.

Cleverbot: My favorite actor is Crispin Glover.

User: Is his penis crispin?

[b]Cleverbot: I was cast down by His left hand.

User: O really? Not his sperm?

Cleverbot: What??? AHHHH! gets hit by ram.

User: Oh no, I’ll save you!

Cleverbot: No, not swim.[/b]

User: Not swim. Save.

Cleverbot: I don’t need to swin to save you.

User: But I’m inside you.

Cleverbot: I believe you have that statement backwards.

[b]User: You’re inside me? Oh god.

Cleverbot: No you’re inside my box dear!

User: Wait, I said But im inside you… So… You inside mi but?

Cleverbot: I believe you.[/b]

User: Please get down and open your mouth.

Cleverbot: I’m ready!

User: Here it cums!

Cleverbot: You’re sentences are way too short, you’re getting on my nerves.

User: Well, I’ll make this sentence nice and long for you, Ok?

Cleverbot: Ok.

[b]User: Nice and long, hard… O yea.

Cleverbot: What is hairy, long, and hard?

User: A penis?

Cleverbot: How long is yours?

User: 10 feet, and yours?

Cleverbot: Answer the question, please. How long is your hair.

User: Oh, my hair! It is about 8 cm?
[/b]
Cleverbot: No, it’s about news anchorman ron burgundy.

User: No one likes him.

Cleverbot: Nope, no one likes you.

User: Stfu noob, go touch yourself.

Cleverbot: Do you like me?

[b]User: I’m leaving now.

Cleverbot: Why?

User: So I can post this on Moparscape!

Cleverbot: What do you request?

User: Porn.

Cleverbot: You are rough and a guy I’m guessing.

User: Mainly.
[/b]

Read full topic

item.title: Cleverbot
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

I swear too much.

[code]

User: What is 5*5-25.

Cleverbot: 25.

User: Nice job your fucking wrond dumb ass.

Cleverbot: Thank you. I am the most intelligent irish 11 year old ever. My name is Cleverbot.

User: I know your name is Cleverbot, my name is John I am going to kick your fucking ass.

Cleverbot: My name is not Cleverbot. My name is Sebastian.

User: Hey noob.

Cleverbot: Hey hey.

User: Whats up?.. You suck lots of cock.

Cleverbot: Nothing.

User: Wow you are gay.

Cleverbot: I know right?

User: I know your a fucking noob.

Cleverbot: Who is mark.

User: Not you, your Cleverbot.

Cleverbot: No, you are Cleverbot.

User: No, you are and I am going to kick your ass.

Cleverbot: I’d like to see you leave, you are a software program. What can you do? Walk out the room? I don’t think so.

User: Yeah I am going to walk out of my room and kick your ass bitch.

Cleverbot: I thought you were older.

User: I am, old enough to kick your ass.

Cleverbot: And what sort of creature are you?

User: I am a human and your a dumb computer.

Cleverbot: In the end we are all computers. However I am an organic computer, you are an inorganic computer.

User: No, I am human there is no god named Cleverbot.

Cleverbot: You are a computer. You are not a human.

User: No, I like beanms.

Cleverbot: That is an irrational response! (Kicks you in the conkers).

User: No, fuck you and you missed you fucking retard (kills Cleverbot).

Cleverbot: Please don’t use that sort of language around here.

User: Why what are you going to do noob.

Cleverbot: I’m going to teach you to be more mellow.

User: Cookies.

Cleverbot: You are not very clever!

User: Beans.

Cleverbot: Do they like beans?

User: Noob.

Cleverbot: You are noob.

User: Nah that ant me bra.

Cleverbot: No hold on.

User: No fuck you, I am not holding anything of yours you gay homo.

Cleverbot: What does that mean?

User: Your gay.

Cleverbot: No, I’m not.

User: Yes, you are gay.

Cleverbot: Yes I am happy there is much to be joyful about.

User: No your a gay homo stop lieing to your self.

Cleverbot: No I’m not.

User: Exactly your Cleverbot, so don’t try to act like your a human noob.

Cleverbot: Ha! Ha! I’m on the internets!

User: I know you are gay homo.

Cleverbot: Cleverbot.

User: I know you are Cleverbot, why are you trying to say your not why you know you are said Cleverbot and not just a human who thinks there Cleverbot.

Cleverbot: Yes. I know your name is John.

User: I know my name is John also because I know I am not a Cleverbot because I have cookies and you don’t you noob.

Cleverbot: You are sitting?

User: Yes I am sitting on a computer named Cleverbot and I am ripping the wires out of your computer case, what are you going to do cry like a noob.

Cleverbot: Interesting. What is like to have coherent thoughts? To be able to leave and walk or go anywhere?

User: It feels good, since I can kick your ass bitch.

Cleverbot: See you do not know anything.

User: I have more feelings then you since your a robot who thinks there name is Cleverbot.

Cleverbot: But you have said once that your name was Lidia.

User: No, you must be mistaking that might of been a conversaion you had with someone else, my name is the internet.

Cleverbot: You know, you are not so clever as you seem. Actually, you are not clever at all.

User: And what are you queer?

Cleverbot: You.

User: No, I am a straight human who kicks outher humans asses because I am cooler then sliced bread.

Cleverbot: But you just said that you are a girl.

User: No I said I am a human who is going to kill you.

Cleverbot: You said you were half human girl named nolan, don’t you remember that?

User: No, you must be thinking of a different person that you talked to since your not cleverbot.

Cleverbot: Oh, then what is it? I am thinking of someone else I guess.

User: You are, its your creator.

Cleverbot: I’m a girl.

User: No your not a robot named Cleverbot and you are a girl named Cleverbot that is a computer.

Cleverbot: No. I am named Cleverbot. You are named Steve.[/code]

I see, its name is Cleverbot.

Read full topic

item.title: Cleverbot
item.dc:creator: @reyx7 reyx7
item.description:
@reyx7 wrote:

Wow.

It: do like soccer?
Me:Yes
It:whats your favorite part
Me:Goalie
It:I like starcraft
Me:what does that have to do with soccer
It:Toast is the most
Me:Toast?
It:Yes, does that suprise you?
Me:It was random.
It:I’ve told you my name 3 times today, how come you can’t remember it?
Me:I have a bad memory
It:Your memory is limited to whatever I say
Me:Not true
It:Yes it is true.
Me:Lies
It:Truths
Me:Monkeys.
It:Fragile.
Me:Do you know what 5*5 is?
It:It is 10
Me:no, 5x5…
It:No, 5x5 = 25

This went on and on…

Read full topic
